descriptions.text: We highly prioritize the privacy of our users on https://mediaunbothered.tech, operating in the Republic of Moldova under the name Media Unbothered ("we," "us," "our"). This privacy notice describes how and why we might collect, store, use, and/or share ("process") your information when you use our services ("Services").

Your ability to access and use the website is contingent upon your acceptance and compliance with this Privacy Policy, which is applicable to all users, including visitors. By choosing to access or use the website, you are expressing your agreement with this Privacy Policy. If you find yourself in disagreement with any aspect of it, please be aware that you are not granted permission to access or use the website.
